articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Steel Complex and Fishery Enterprise
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Steel Complex and Fishery Enterprise
Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Songjin Steel Complex and the Kim Chaek Taehung Fishery Enterprise.
					The first leg of his guidance was the Songjin Steel Complex.
					
					He looked round the revolutionary museum and the room dedicated to the history of the complex where he saw the relics that bear witness to immortal revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung. There he said that the complex has turned into a powerful and Juche-based giant metallurgical centre under the wise leadership and meticulous care of the President.
					
					He noted that the workers in Songgang are, indeed, the heroic workers who have taken the lead in upholding the Party and the leader by increasing the steel production in every period and at each stage of the revolution, calling on them to continue upholding and preserving this brilliant tradition of struggle in the future, too.
					
					He made the rounds of production processes including the combined control room and the converter shop for several hours to learn in detail about technical updating and production there.
					
					It is a signal success of weighty importance to be specially recorded in the history of the development of the metallurgical industry that the complex has rounded off the most advanced steelmaking method based on the Juche iron with their own efforts and technology, he noted, highly appreciating the shining feats the officials, technicians and workers have performed by succeeding in their research into the new steelmaking method and extending thanks to them.
					
					He said the most important task facing the complex is to fully introduce the above-said steelmaking method into production to successfully realize the Juche orientation of the metallurgical industry.
					
					The next leg of his guidance was the Kim Chaek Taehung Fishery Enterprise.
					
					He made the rounds of various places including the general processing shop to acquaint himself in detail with the technical updating and fish processing.
					
					He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the enterprise successfully realized the modernization of the processing in a matter of one year and overfulfilled its fishing plan. He highly appreciated the successes made in their endeavors and set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the enterprise.
					
					He was accompanied by Hong Sok Hyong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Cuban FM
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Cuban FM
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a conversation with Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla, foreign minister of Cuba, when the latter paid a courtesy call on him Thursday.

articles.title: Cuban Government Delegation Here
articles.content:
Cuban Government Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- A government delegation of Cuba led by Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla arrived here Thursday. 
					 It was met at the airport by Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Minister of Public Health Leaves for Nepal
articles.content:
DPRK Minister of Public Health Leaves for Nepal
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health, and his party left here Thursday to participate in the  WHO meeting of health ministers of Southeast Asia and the general assembly to be held in Nepal.

articles.title: Researcher of IIJI Arrives Here
articles.content:
Researcher of IIJI Arrives Here
Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Noriaki Obuchi, researcher of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), arrived in Pyongyang on Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Brazil Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Brazil Appointed
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Ri Hwa Gun was appointed as the DPRK ambassador to Brazil, according to the decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Fine Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Fine Art Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- An opening ceremony of the fine art exhibition of Pyongyang University of Fine Arts took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Thursday.
					On display there are at least 490 art works produced by teachers, creators and students of the university.
					
					Korean paintings "First fruit of cooperativization" and "First gun salute heralding the appearance of a thriving nation", oil painting "Calling on us to live up to the trust of Comrade Commander" and other works impressively deal with traces of the patriotic devotion left by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					Korean painting "Fireworks of a thriving nation" and oil painting "We shall win" and other works successfully depict the sky-high spirit and struggle of all the servicepersons and people making a general advance towards the gate to the thriving nation.
					
					Oil painting "New appearance of Nyongwon", sculpture "furnaceman" and pencil drawing "Bust of a miner" and other works deal with magnificent edifices that sprang up in the Songun era and innovators working miracles and feats in work sites for an economic power everyday.
					
					Also on display there are works on the happiness of the Korean people and the scenery of the country being turned into a socialist land of bliss and diverse industrial art designs.
					
					Present at the ceremony were Kang Nung Su, minister of Culture, officials concerned, teachers, creators and students of the university and working people in the city.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Farm Machines Held
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Farm Machines Held
Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of farm machines was held in Koksan County, North Hwanghae Province, from Sept. 1 to 3.
					On display there were lots of farm machines and farm implements of 25 kinds contrived and manufactured by officials, scientists, technicians and other working people in the field of agriculture.
					
					The participants exchanged successes and experience gained in contriving, manufacturing and introducing valuable farm machines and discussed scientific and technological issues arising in the agricultural production.

articles.title: Reception Held to Mark 10th Anniversary of Founding of IMAGC
articles.content:
Reception Held to Mark 10th Anniversary of Founding of IMAGC
Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at Yanggakdo International Hotel on Sept. 2 to mark the 10th anniversary of the founding of the International Martial Arts Games Committee (IMAGC).
					Present there were Pak Hak Son, chairman of the Korean Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, Chang Ung, chairman of the International Martial Arts Games Committee who doubles as president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation, Leong Wai Meng, vice-president of the federation and secretary general of the committee, members of the executive committee, delegates of various countries and regions, Hwang Pong Yong, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee who is president of the Korean Martial Arts Federation, and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Orchestra
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Orchestra
Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia.
					The gift was handed to an official concerned by Pavel Borisovich Ovsyannikov, head and chief conductor of the orchestra, on Thursday.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Three-Revolution Exhibition
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Three-Revolution Exhibition
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here visited the Three-Revolution Exhibition Thursday on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK. 
					Being briefed on the fact that the Korean people have achieved signal successes in the struggle to implement the line of three revolutions --ideological, technical and cultural-- they went round goods on display at the heavy industry exhibition showing the might of the self-supporting national economy.
					
					 After the visit they made entries in the visitors' book.

articles.title: Anthracite Mass-Excavating Method Developed
articles.content:
Anthracite Mass-Excavating Method Developed
Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The Coal Mining Engineering Institute under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK has completed an anthracite mass-excavating method.
					It can expand excavation to a broader extent and raise the mining rate on the basis of the accurate estimation of coal deposits, geological conditions, etc.
					
					The scientists there have put on a scientific basis the method of confirming the layout of coal in sections where coal cannot be excavated by the existing method and in the sections under excavation and of deciding the elements needed for coal mining in a rational way.
					
					The scientists dispatched to the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine have analyzed the data including the size of the existing coal fields, their geological structure, objects to be excavated and others in a comprehensive way and realized their mathematic modeling.
					
					And they elucidated the distribution character of coal fields in a scientific way to markedly boost production per coal releasing pit and productive capacity per shift.
					
					As a result, the excavating rate of the colliery upped by 50 percent as against the preceding period. Various coal mines in the west region have applied this method to production, turning out large quantities of coal.

articles.title: Newly Developed Dress Design Aid System
articles.content:
Newly Developed Dress Design Aid System
Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Scientists in the Information Center under Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry have developed a dress design aid system which will ensure the scientific accuracy and quality of clothing design on the highest level.
					All the processes are computerized from the input of data to dress pattern design, pattern arrangement, check-up and amendment, with the result that the time and manpower needed for technical preparation have been reduced by half and proper designing can be made.
					
					Having optimized designing indexes according to body models and sizes, it can conduct a dress-wearing simulation and thus cut down the consumption of materials to the minimum and remarkably raise productivity and quality of goods. 
					
					The system has been introduced at various clothing factories in Pyongyang including the Aeguk Moran Clothing Factory and Aeguk Choe Jong Rak Clothing Factory to pay off profusely.
					
					It was highly appreciated at the Pyongyang exhibition of scientific and technological successes of youth held some time ago.

articles.title: Majon Hotel Built in Beautiful East Coast
articles.content:
Majon Hotel Built in Beautiful East Coast
Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- A hotel has recently been built wonderfully in Majon on the outskirts of Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province of Korea.
					The Majon Hotel consists of three buildings, which harmonize the formative and artistic representations with each other in a perfect way. 
					
					The upper part of the hotel looks like a seagull flying into the sky.
					
					There are a sea bathing place and sandy beach in front of the hotel. Its exterior walls are painted in light blue color. An emblem symbolizing a sailing ship is embossed in the centre of the facade of the building.
					
					One can enter the entrance hall through a revolving door and see a ceiling chandelier emitting dazzling silver-white light and a decoration water column which sprays various colors of water.
					
					The floor of the entrance hall is covered with light cream tiles.
					
					The dance hall with automatic sensor illumination, shop, bowling alley and indoor wading pool equipped with shower and supersonic tapotement devices of lying form are not inferior to others.
					
					A banquet hall is harmonized in colors as a whole. Its tables, chairs and the walls decorated with shell patterns are blended with each other and their forms are colorful as if they were a delicate art work.
					
					Having amusement room, dinning room, reception room, study room and bed-room, rooms ensure all conveniences to the guests.
					
					Shower stalls, beach volleyball ground and open-air seats which were built along the seashore are unique in elegance and architecture.

articles.title: Promising Boy Footballer
articles.content:
Promising Boy Footballer
yongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The children's football team of the DPRK distinguished itself at the AFC U-13 Festival of Football.
					Quarterback Kim Myong Guk attracted attention of football experts and fans at the festival.
					
					He scored wonderful goals with his quick judgment, sudden involvement in offensives and powerful shooting, thus contributing to the victory of his team in the games with soccer teams of other countries.
					
					Seeing his vigorous activities in each game, participants in the festival did not stint their praise of him, saying that he is a promising footballer.
					
					He, who learned how to play football at Namsan Primary School in Haeju City, is preparing himself as a future footballer at the football team of Haeju City Juvenile Sports School.
					
					Choe Chol, chief football coach of the Juvenile General Training School, said that he is absorbed in training with a will to become a footballer who will display the honor of the country, adding that he will distinguish himself in the future Asian Juvenile Football Championship, too.

articles.title: Memorial Service Held for Koreans Killed in Great Kanto Quake
articles.content:
Memorial Service Held for Koreans Killed in Great Kanto Quake 
Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- A memorial service was held in Tokyo on September 1 for the Koreans who were killed in the massacre of Koreans perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists during the great Kanto quake.
					Present there were Ko Tok U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), officials of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, compatriots and students of Korean schools.
					
					Ri Myong Yu, vice-chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, in his memorial address at the service referred to the fact that a large number of Koreans were brutally killed by the Japanese government and the ultra-right forces during the great earthquake that occurred in Kanto region on September 1, 1923.
					
					86 years have passed since the massacre but the Japanese authorities have not yet properly probed the truth about the mass killings, far from making an apology and reparation for the massacre of Koreans, he deplored.
					
					He strongly urged the Japanese authorities to fundamentally rectify the hostile policy towards the DPRK, drawing a proper lesson from the blood-stained history of aggression and the colonial policy in the last century.
					
					He declared that the Korean people would force Japan to thoroughly probe the truth about their mass killings of Koreans committed by the Japanese imperialists and wrest an apology and reparation from the Japanese government and thus get the victims' grudge settled without fail.
					
					Seizaburo Eguchi, vice-chairman of the Nakano Ward Assembly of Tokyo Metropolis who is representative of the Tokyo Ward Assemblymen's Liaison Council for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship, in a speech noted that the Japanese authorities should not be allowed to cover up the massacre of Koreans and the national discrimination perpetrated in the past. He added that he would intensify the activities for friendship and fraternity with the DPRK in a bid to help Chongryon in its national education and strive hard to get the ban on the port call of Mangyongbong-92 lifted as soon as possible.

articles.title: Juche Idea and Songun Politics Lauded by Mexican Figure
articles.content:
Juche Idea and Songun Politics Lauded by Mexican Figure 
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, issued a statement on August 25 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 He, referring to the successes of the DPRK, stressed that the master key to the Korean people's display of tremendous might is the Juche idea and the Songun politics.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea and successfully embodied them in practice, he noted, and went on:
					
					 Since the demise of Kim Il Sung, the supreme leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Il has enforced the Songun politics based on the Juche idea in all fields. 
					
					 The members of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico are confident that the Korean people will creditably carry out Kim Il Sung's instructions for national reunification and achieve greater successes, he emphasized.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Lectures were sponsored by the Socialist Party of Romania, the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung, the Indian Intellectuals' Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Indian Working Women Society for Study of the Juche Philosophy from Aug. 23 to 25 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said in a lecture referred to the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung. He praised Kim Jong Il for having wisely led the struggle of the Korean people to build a thriving socialist nation on the land of the DPRK, the legacy bequeathed to the Korean people by the President, pursuant to the original Songun politics.  
					
					Shrendra Singh, secretary general of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung, said that Kim Jong Il has trained the Korean People's Army into an important political force leading the socialist cause, militant ranks reliably defending the socialist cause and a powerful revolutionary force steering the overall socialist construction. 
					
					V. K. Chopra, chairman of the Indian Intellectuals' Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted that under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il the KPA has grown to be an invincible army and the Korean people have brought about fresh miracles and innovations in the building of a thriving nation, shattering all machinations of the imperialists. 
					
					A seminar and a meeting were held in Pakistan and a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition, a lecture and a film show in Brazil on Aug. 21 and 24 on the occasions of the 49th anniversary of
						 Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership and the 61st birthday of the DPRK. 
					
					A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Romania
Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Rotarimond Publishing House in Romania on August 27.
					The work published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008) clarifies the idea that the 60-year long history of the DPRK is a history of great struggle and victory and that of great creation and change during which the Korean people defended the independence and honor of the country and built a socialist country, rich and powerful and prosperous, despite the tempest of the revolution under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and the great party and that a country, though small and backward, can become a developed, dignified and strong country when it has a great leader and great party.
					
					 The work also indicates tasks and ways for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, holding high the banner of the Juche idea, the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Observed in Brazil
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Observed in Brazil
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- A Brazilian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated with due ceremony on August 25.
					 Jose Gil de Almeida, chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events such as meetings, seminars and photo exhibitions to laud the immortal exploits performed by the President for the human cause of independence till April of 2012, the centenary of his birth.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige distritos de Kyongsong y Myongchon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige distritos de Kyongsong y Myongchon
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno las labores de varios sectores del distrito de Kyongsong y el de Myongchon.
					Primero, recorrio el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de Kyongsong y el Lugar de Interes Historico-Revolucionario de Yombunjin donde estan registradas las huellas de actividades revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					La educacion mediante los establecimientos de ese tipo tiene mucha importancia para armar a los militantes del partido y los trabajadores con la idea revolucionaria del PTC, senalo y aclaro las tareas y remedios para ese fin.
					
					Llegado a la Fabrica de Aisladores de Kyongsong, dio una vuelta por la lapida con instruccion dada en el terreno por el Presidente y el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion de el.
					
					Seguidamente, estuvo en el taller de aislador no. 2 y otros lugares informandose en detalles de la situacion de renovacion tecnologica y produccion.
					
					A continuacion, el Dirigente visito el Sanatorio   Kim Jong Suk.
					
					Tras escuchar explicaciones sobre la fuente termal de Kyongsong, recorrio la parte interior del sanatorio averiguando minuciosamente el estado de equipos medicos y tratamiento medico.
					
					La fuente termal de Kyongsong es buena para la terapia de varias enfermedades porque tiene muchos elementos medicinales de alta eficacia, senalo y subrayo que hay que acondicionar mejor el sanatorio y mejorar su administracion para que los habitantes se beneficien en lo suficiente de la asistencia medica gratuita.
					
					Luego, paso revista a las viviendas construidas nuevamente en torno al sanatorio en el distrito de Kyongsong y visito el hogar del ex oficial del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Ju Kwang Su, quien trabaja ahora como doctor del sanatorio, estimulando cordialmente a el y sus familiares.
					
					La Zona de Recreo del Monte Chilbo fue el proximo destino de la visita de orientacion del Dirigente.
					
					El se cercioro en detalles de la construccion de esa zona recorriendo la larga ruta de visita que incluye los tres Chilbos (repartos del monte de igual nombre), o sea, el interior, el exterior y el maritimo. 
					
					Para hacer que muchos visitantes disfruten del paisaje fascinante del monte Chilbo y tomen un descanso cultural divertido, hay que facilitarles suficientes condiciones de visita, dijo el Dirigente y aclaro la direccion y remedios concretos para el respecto.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente estuvo en la recien construida aldea de la fuente termal de Hwangjin. 
					
					Visito la red de servicios publicos generales dotada a perfeccion de todas las instalaciones necesarias y el hogar del granjero Won Ki Chol y deseo el futuro feliz de los granjeros que viven en las magnificas y modernas viviendas. 
					
					 Hay que usar ampliamente la fuente termal de Hwangjin que es muy buena para el fomento de la salud de la gente, dijo y presento las tareas para ese fin. 
					
					Ahora cuando suena alto la cancion de marcha de la revolucion, se registran por doquier de nuestro pais relevantes milagros y meritos que sorprenden al mundo y se aumentan cada dia mas las riquezas de la patria, destaco el Dirigente.
					
					Agrego que este gran cambio sin precedente en la historia es el noble fruto del infinito poderio espiritual y noble patriotismo de nuestro pueblo que trabaja manifestando su determinacion de vida o muerte para construir sin falta con sus propias fuerzas una gran potencia prospera.
					
					El Dirigente expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que los trabajadores de los distritos de Kyongsong y Myongchon seguiran desempenando excelentemente el papel de vanguardia en la magna lucha por edificar una gran potencia prospera. 
					
					El Dirigente fue acompanado por el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, Hong Sok Hyong, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun se reune con el canciller cubano
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun se reune con el canciller cubano
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Ui Chun, departio el dia 3 con su homologo de la Republica de Cuba, Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: En Pyongyang la delegacion gubernamental de Cuba
articles.content:
En Pyongyang la delegacion gubernamental de Cuba 
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Arribo el dia 3 a esta capital la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica de Cuba encabezada por el canciller Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla.
					En el aeropuerto los huespedes fueron acogidos por el vicecanciller coreano, Kim Hyong Jun, y el embajador cubano en la RPDC, Jose Manuel Galego Montano.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Brasil
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Brasil
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Ri Hwa Gun fue designado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a acreditarse en la Republica Federativa de Brasil.

articles.title: Rusia toma contramedida frente al sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. y Japon
articles.content:
Rusia toma contramedida frente al sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. y Japon
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En una rueda de prensa concedida el 26 de agosto, Nikolai Makarov, jefe del Estado Mayor General de las Fuerzas Armadas de la Federacion Rusa, anuncio que su pais emplazo un batallon de S-400 Triumf en la region del Lejano Oriente.
					Las opiniones publicas lo califican de contramedida de Rusia frente a las cada dia mas recrudescentes maniobras de Estados Unidos y Japon dirigidas al aumento armamentista.
					
					El periodico digital Ekspert Online de Rusia transcendio que el establecimiento en el Lejano Oriente del sistema antimisiles y antiaereo es para hacer frente a la red de defensa antimisil de EE.UU. en la region de Asia y Pacifico y al sistema de misiles interceptores implantado en Japon.
					
					El primer subdirector del Instituto de Estudios Geopoliticos de Rusia aclaro que su pais establece en la region del Lejano Oriente un sistema equivalente al de defensa antimisil y antiaereo de EE.UU. que se extiende hacia el flanco este de Rusia y que esta esta interesada en mantener a raya la amenaza de EE.UU. que provoco varias guerras ilegales en los ultimos 10 anos.
